title: Decision of accession proved Pakistan lives in Kashmiris hearts: Shibli
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 19 (APP):Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz said on Sunday that Kashmirisâ€™ decision of accession to Pakistan was the proof that Pakistan lived in their hearts.
In a tweet, the minister said this decision was a slap in the face of those who subjugated it through force and coercion.
He said till achievement of the Kashmiris goal of self-determination, Pakistan would continue their moral, political and diplomatic support with full force.
